findings.message: Planning validation says "no RoomsSection render tests found," but `apps/brikette/src/test/components/ga4-11-select-item-room-ctas.test.tsx` already renders `RoomsSection` and asserts CTA behavior.
Simulation trace repeats the incorrect claim that there are no existing button-count/conflict tests; existing GA4 room-CTA tests query NR CTA labels and will require updates under single-CTA mode.

TC-03 states disabled-button behavior is preserved via `disabled` action state, but current implementation preserves behavior by navigation guard (`queryState !== "invalid"`), not by setting `disabled` in shared `RoomsSection` actions.
Acceptance requires both `apps/brikette` and `packages/ui` tests to pass, but the specified test command in this task only runs brikette Jest config.
Overall acceptance test command validates only brikette tests, so it does not satisfy the stated cross-package test pass criterion.
Rebuild dependency on `@acme/ui` before adapter wiring is accurately captured and correctly sequenced.
